ProductInfo.Features:
The Samsung Galaxy P-7510/M16 remains one of the top contenders in the tablet war
A dual-core A9 1GHz processor and NVIDIA GPU and Tegra2 chipset gives this Samsung Galaxy tablet fantastic speeds and multitasking abilities
A 10.1 capacitive WXGA multi-touch capable display of this Samsung tablet PC delivers crisp, HD images that complement the metallic-gray exterior
The Samsung Galaxy P-7510/M16 features A-GPS support, dual cameras, Wi-Fi, HSPDA (21Mb/s) and Flash 10.1 support that gives a well-rounded browsing experience
Running on Android Honeycomb, this Samsung Galaxy tablet has full access to thousands of apps from the Android Market
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung Galaxy Tab GT-P7510 16GB Android Metallic Gray - Wi-Fi Tablet
